name: Screen Recording and Mirror
description: Record your Android screen to a video file or screencast your Android to a Fire TV, Apple TV, Chrome, or even another Android!  Fire TV instructions: On your FireTV, Download AllCast Receiver for Fire TV and start the application http://www.amazon.com/ClockworkMod-AllCast-for-Fire-TV/dp/B00JHMPP9S   AppleTV: No setup necessary!   Chrome instructions: Download AllCast Receiver from the Chrome web store and start the application https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/allcast-receiver/hjbljnpdahefgnopeohlaeohgkiidnoe?hl=en-US Firewall notes: Cant find the Receiver? Adjust your firewall settings to allow UDP/TCP ports 53515.  Android to Android mirroring: Download AllCast Receiver from the Google Play store and start the application http://bit.ly/1uRkpcb   Screen Recording also supports recording to GIF.  Happy mirroring!
